sendMessages.label: Urwego rwuburenganzira rusabwa kugirango wohereze ubutumwa
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 bivuze ko abanyamuryango bose bashobora kohereza ubutumwa, kandi nini umubare bivuze ko uruhushya rwo hejuru rusabwa
